titles.title: To authorize the appropriation of $8,000,000,000 for disaster loans.
To authorize the appropriation of $8,000,000,000 for disaster loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the appropriation of $8 billion to the Small Business Administration (SBA) for disaster loans. The SBA disaster loan program provides low-interest loans to homeowners, renters, businesses, and nonprofit organizations to assist with rebuilding and recovering after disasters.
